fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Get a taste of Turkey at £139 for seven nights' B&B from Gatwick 16 May and staying at the 2-star Seril II Hotel with Jewel in the Crown Holidays (01293 533338). Manchester departures are £209. Under £300 Lastminute.com (0207 400 7044) has a two-night beach break on Jersey for £229, with B&B at the four-star Hotel La Place near St Aubin's Bay, where you can learn to jetski, surf and dive. Flights depart 1 May to 30 May. Under £500 Get 56 per cent off a seven-night Mediterranean cruise, which now costs £499 full board leaving Venice and calling at Corfu, Rhodes and Mykonos. Flights leave London 11, 18 and 25 May and 1 and 8 June with Costa Cruises (020 7940 4499). Escape to Thailand for a two-week beach break at £468. The price with Bridge The World (0870 444 1716) includes flights from 1 May to 30 June and room-only board at the beachside Regent Cha Am Hotel. Under £1,000 Sail around the volcanic peaks in the Azores and watch for whales. For £799 Sta (023 9283 2055) has 10 days on a tall ship, working as crew and with all meals included. Flights are extra but cost about £300 return for the trip, which leaves on 6 June. Under £1,500 Leave before 30 April and you pay £1,099 for a 10-night South African adventure with Virgin Holidays (0870 0000870), including all flights, B&B, game drives, a winelands tour and peninsula tour in Cape Town. · Unless otherwise stated, prices are per person, based on two people sharing.
